original_text: For afore the harvest, when the bud is perfect, and the sour grape is ripening in the flower, he shall both cut off the sprigs with pruning hooks, and take away and cut down the branches.
korean_text: 추수하기 전에 꽃이 떨어지고 포도가 맺혀 익어갈 때에 내가 낫으로 그 연한 가지를 베며 퍼진 가지를 찍어 버려서

sentences.original_text: and the sour grape is ripening in the flower
sentences.korean_translation: 시큼한 포도가 꽃에서 익어가고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: he shall both cut off the sprigs with pruning hooks
and take away and cut down the branches
